topicTitle: You may has noticed half our forums are gone?

posts.postText:
Thank Mak from S3G for that.

Goodday.

The newest 20 pages of mod logs are of him deleting stuff.
The hell is S3G?  Why in god's name would he do that?

S3G is the clan that a guy named DarK_St3alth created (who used to be in our clan) and he created it because he didn't like Gash. (He overreacted.)

Half of our little kids (Link, Chessnut) went there because they assumed they would get admin quickly.

Since then they stole some of our stuff a few times, and then there was a period when we just didn't talk to them.

Now they are back because they can and pretty much they are like the old legend of Havoc Gamers, full of whiny little kids led by 1 or 2 people who knows how to code.

The end.

I'm just gonna lock this now, this won't be good for our forums. We don't need this here. Yes, half the forums are gone, we don't need countless posts of flame.
We've established that this is a dark day for NNJG.
